DOC.detailed_description: Implant placement abutment design plan computer software guide implant treatment ( SIMPLANT ) . The surgical implant placement perform manufacturer 's protocol placing implant platform 1mm buccal aspect osteotomy ( Koutouzis et al 2013 ) . Virtually design , permanent CAD-CAM fabricate abutment ( ATLANTIS , DENTSPLY ) different configuration subcritical contour ( emergence shape ) connect implant temporary crown deliver . Implants Group 1 permanent abutment concave configuration subcritical contour ( emergence shape ) . Implants Group 2 permanent abutment convex configuration subcritical contour ( emergence shape ) . The patient restore single crown 3 month follow implant installation . A randomization protocol produce computer-generated list distribution subject two treatment group .
DOC.criteria: General Inclusion criterion : Age 21 year Absence relevant medical condition Availability 12 month followup Specific Inclusion criterion : One miss tooth maxillary premolar region Presence two adjacent teeth implant site Absence periodontal disease Healed osseous architecture enough receive implant diameter least 3.5 mm sufficient amount bone place implant length least 9 mm General Pregnancy screen visit . Smoking 10 cig/day Specific Exclusion criterion : Adjacent implant Presence periapical radiolucency adjacent teeth Missing adjacent teeth
